entries.title: In New Zealand, conservation is buoyed by Indigenous knowledge
entries.description: Blending Māori knowledge into federally funded crayfish research makes for better science.

entries.title: Review: Lenovo’s ThinkPad Z13 is a bit weird, but Ryzen 6000 is fantastic
entries.description: The best ThinkPad qualities are sadly diluted, but performance is excellent.

entries.title: Celibacy has surprising evolutionary advantages, according to new research
entries.description: A study on the consequences of becoming a monk related to evolutionary fitness.
